info.name: Scrivener
info.attribution:
Original room layout, game design, and card design by Zoql. Adapted to virtualtabletop.io by LawDawg96. Ink bottle icon by LawDawg96. All released to the Public Domain as CC0.

Room background image by ChrisFiedler available under the Pixabay license from https://pixabay.com/photos/paper-old-texture-parchment-1074131/.

Skull, compas, magnifying glass, and heart icons are by Lorc and are available under CC BY 3.0 from:
 - https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/piece-skull.html
 - https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/compass.html
 - https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/magnifying-glass.html
 - https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cupidon-arrow.html
info.description: Build a deck of letters with various powers. Form words from letters to score points and buy ink and remover. Play until first player reaches 60 points. Highest score wins.

fields.text: Are there at least 4 cards of the same genre or of 6+ cost?

cea1.css: background: white; color: black;font-size:18px; border:1px solid lightgrey;display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;

cea2.css: background: white; color: black;font-size:16px; border:1px solid lightgrey;transform-origin:bottom left

cea3.css: background: white; border-radius: 4px; color: black;font-size:16px; border:1px solid lightgrey;transform-origin:bottom left

78d2.css: background: white; color: black;font-size:16px; border:1px solid lightgrey;transform-origin:bottom left

78d3.css: background: white; border-radius: 4px; color: black;font-size:16px; border:1px solid lightgrey;transform-origin:bottom left

ab53.css: background: white; border-radius: 4px; color: black;font-size:16px; border:1px solid lightgrey;transform-origin:bottom left

fields.text: This will reset the scores, recall all cards, and setup for a new game. Are you sure?
